The official URL for this profile is: 

https://github.com/BIH-CEI/RareLink/StructureDefinition/rarelink-observation-age-category

A RareLink-specific profile for capturing the age category of a patient as an observation, based on the ERDRI-CDS value set.

This profile builds on Observation.

This profile was published on 2025-05-08 01:03:44+0900 as a draft by Berlin Institute of Health - Charité Universitätsmedizin Berlin
